---
title: Metadata
---

Rogue Scholar supports the following metadata:

| Property | Required | Description |
| -------- | -------- | ----------- |
| Title    | yes      | The title of the blog post. |
| Authors  | yes      | The authors of the blog post. |
| License  | yes      | The license for the blog post. The Rogue Scholar only accepts content with a Creative Commons Attribution (CC-BY) license. |
| Description | recommended | An abstract of the blog post. |
| Language | recommended | The language the blog post is written in. |
